Script.script:
MuMeM.Skill.Skill = MuMeM.Skill.Skill or { _uid = nil, _name = nil, _maxPrac = nil, _maxPercFormula = nil, }
mumem_inherit("MuMeM.Skill.Skill", "MuMeM.Skill.Skill")
function MuMeM.Skill.Skill:new(props) local me = props or {}
setmetatable(me, self) self.__index = self
return me end
function MuMeM.Skill.Skill:uid() return self._uid end
function MuMeM.Skill.Skill:name() return self._name end
function MuMeM.Skill.Skill:maxPrac() return self._maxPrac end
function MuMeM.Skill.Skill:maxPerc(baseStats) -- {str=N, con=N, ...} if not self._maxPercFormula then return nil end
local formula = "return "..self._maxPercFormula local tr = {} for k,v in pairs(baseStats) do formula = string.gsub(formula, "{"..string.upper(k).."}", v) end
local maxPerc = loadstring(formula)()
return maxPerc end
function MuMeM.Skill.Skill:update(props) if props.uid then self._uid = props.uid end if props.name then self._name = props.name end if props.maxPrac then self._maxPrac = props.maxPrac end if props.maxPercFormula then self._maxPercFormula = props.maxPercFormula end end
